suite.name: MIRO

test.name: Create Invoice Receipt MIRO

kw.name: Prepare SAP
Connect to Running SAP
kw.msg: Connected to a running SAP instance.
kw.doc: Connect to an already running SAP instance and take control of it.

kw.name: Maximize window
kw.msg: The window in the foreground was maximized.
kw.doc: Maximize the window in the foreground.
Conecta ao SAP

kw.name: Execute Transaction
kw.msg: The transaction with T-Code /nmiro was executed.
kw.doc: Execute the transaction with the given T-Code.

kw.name: Abrir Planilha de Dados de Teste
Join Path
kw.msg: ${caminho_planilha} = C:\Users\ETH6\OneDrive - VIBRA\Documentos\GitHub\testeS4\Dados\Dados apresentação 22-08.xlsx
kw.doc: Joins the given path part(s) to the given base path.

kw.name: Open Workbook
kw.msg: Opened workbook: <RPA.Excel.Files.XlsxWorkbook object at 0x000002A65C5E5C40>
kw.doc: Open an existing Excel workbook.
Abre o arquivo Excel com os dados para a execução dos casos de teste.

kw.name: Read Worksheet As Table
kw.msg: Created table: Table(columns=['Pedido Origem', 'Preço', 'TIP DE PEDIDO', 'FORNECEDOR', 'COND.PAG', 'INCOTERM', 'ORG. COMPRAS', 'GP. COMPRADOR', 'EMPRESA', 'MATERIAL', 'QNTD', 'CENTRO', 'TP CONTRATO', 'ITEM CONT.', 'Data de Remessa', 'NV CONTRATO', 'NV PEDIDO', 'MIGO', 'MIRO'], rows=2)

${testData} = Table(columns=['Pedido Origem', 'Preço', 'TIP DE PEDIDO', 'FORNECEDOR', 'COND.PAG', 'INCOTERM', 'ORG. COMPRAS', 'GP. COMPRADOR', 'EMPRESA', 'MATERIAL', 'QNTD', 'CENTRO', 'TP CONTRATO', 'ITEM CONT.', '...
kw.doc: Read the contents of a worksheet into a Table container. Allows sorting/filtering/manipulating using the ``RPA.Tables`` library.

kw.name: Read Statusbar
kw.msg: The statusbar was read.
${statusbar} = {'status': 'Empty', 'message': ''}
kw.doc: Read the contents of the statusbar. The return value is a dictionary with the entries 'status' and 'message'.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.arg: Erro ao processar pedido: ${row['NV PEDIDO']} - Mensagem de erro: ${statusbar['message']}
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

test.doc: Executa o processo completo de criação de Invoice Receipt na transação MIRO

suite.doc:
Caso de teste para transação MIRO - Invoice Receipt Convertido de script VBS para Robot Framework usando RoboSAPiens
Este teste automatiza a criação de um recibo de fatura (Invoice Receipt) na transação MIRO do SAP, reproduzindo exatamente o comportamento do script VBS original.
